name: final_project
description: Digitalization Plan for judicial offices software.
author: Andres Galvan <afgalvan@unicesar.edu.co>

scripts.build: mkdir -p out/production/FinalProject && javac -encoding UTF-8 $(find ./src/* | grep .java) -d out/production/FinalProject -cp lib/junit-4.12.jar:lib/lombok.jar:lib/jackson-anotations-2.12.2.jar:lib/jackson-core-2.12.2.jar:lib/jackson-databind-2.12.2.jar:lib/sqlite-jdbc-3.32.3.2.jar:lib/RojeruSan.jar:lib/flatlaf-1.1.1.jar:lib/RSTableMetro.jar -Xlint:deprecation

ghooks.pre-commit: yarn run editorconfig-checker && yarn run format
